attributes.action: Annul the EU referendum as those who voted did so on the basis of misinformation
attributes.additional_details:
BBC - Reality Check - EU Referendum
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/live/uk-politics-eu-referendum-35603388

Full Fact - independent fact checking organisation
http://fullfact.org/europe
attributes.background: Leaving the EU is a monumental, permanent decision. It is wrong for voters to decide on the basis of lies and misinformation. For example, the Leave campaign claimed that we'd save £50m a day by leaving EU and that this could be spent on the NHS. This persuasive statement is a lie.
